tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingRetailStore (
   store_id INT,
   store_name VARCHAR(255),
   location VARCHAR(255),
   square_footage INT,
   energy_star_certified BOOLEAN,
   solar_panels_installed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE stores (
    store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    energy_rating INT,
    construction_material VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    store_id INT,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    energy_consumption FLOAT,
    energy_source VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES stores(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingMaterials (
    material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name STRING,
    material_type STRING,
    energy_rating INT,
    environmental_impact FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE RetailStores (
    store_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    store_name STRING,
    store_location STRING,
    store_size INT,
    energy_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyEfficiencyMeasures (
    measure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    measure_name STRING,
    measure_description STRING,
    cost FLOAT,
    estimated_savings FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Employee (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(255),
    store_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES Store(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sale (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE retail_stores (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    square_footage INT,
    building_material VARCHAR(255),
    energy_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE store_products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    stock_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    store_id INT,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    energy_usage DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (store_id, year, month)
);

CREATE TABLE green_building_materials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    source VARCHAR(255),
    sustainability_rating INT,
    cost_per_unit DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_savings (
    store_id INT,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    savings_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (store_id, year, month)
);
